show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #46 Steve Stratford "Cows Build Towns"
subtitle: #46 Steve Stratford "Cows Build Towns"
summary:
In the studio this week with my friend Steve Stratford to discuss genetics, markets and the cattle business from his unique perspective and over 30 years in the cattle business in South Central Kansas.
